item.title: 4enraya
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python3 from pwn import * e = ELF("./4enraya_patched") context.binary = e # Set the target binary for pwntools context.terminal = ["kitty", "-e"] # Terminal to use for GDB debugging HOST = "10.

item.title: addition

item.title: Function overwrite
